industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
Fud, the World's First Social Hustling Community, is seeking a talented Etsy Consultant to join our growing community. As a Etsy Consultant, you will be responsible for helping our users optimize their Etsy stores and increase conversions. This is a key role within our community that requires expert knowledge of Etsy and retail industry experience.

At Fud, we're on a mission to help people put more money in their pockets. As a member of the community, you'll play a critical role in helping others achieve their financial goals. We're a close-knit community of hustlers helping hustlers, and we're looking for an experienced Etsy Consultant to join us and help us continue to grow.

Responsibilities

  • Work directly with users to optimize their Etsy stores
  • Analyze conversion data and provide recommendations for improvements
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest Etsy best practices and industry trends
  • Manage multiple projects and clients simultaneously, ensuring deadlines are met


Requirements

  • 3+ years of experience as a Etsy seller/expert
  • Strong understanding of retail industry and ecommerce best practices
  • Experience working with ecommerce tools such as Google Analytics, email marketing tools, and SEO optimization tools
  • Ability to work independently and efficiently manage time and priorities
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills


Benefits

Why should you join Fud?

  • Find a community of like-minded hard working solopreneurs and entrepreneurs
  • Choose your own schedule and work when you want.
